summary: Both previously reported logic issues have been addressed and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Invalid tiers can bypass validation via overrides
previous_issues_status.notes: Tier validation now occurs before any override resolution, preventing bypass.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Cached overrides ignored when overrideProvider is undefined
previous_issues_status.notes: Override lookup now runs when either Redis or the provider is available, allowing cache hits without a DB provider.
